Package my.uum

Class dbConnection

java.lang.Object
my.uum.dbConnection
public class dbConnection
extends java.lang.Object
This class is contains a lot of sql function for telegram bot interaction.

      public static void insertGolfer​(java.lang.String GolferName, int GolferHandicap, long TelegramID)

      Parameters:
      GolferName - golfer name
      GolferHandicap - golfer handicap
      TelegramID - telegram ID take from telegram

      Parameters:
      telegram_id - telegram ID take from telegram
      Returns:
      True or False

    • golferInformation

      public static java.lang.String golferInformation​(long telegram_id)
      This method is use for telegram can get golfer information from sqlite thought telegram ID
      Parameters:
      telegram_id - user telegram ID take from telegram chat
      Returns:
      golfer ID, golfer name and golfer handicap return to telegram bot

    • readtournament

      public static java.lang.String readtournament()
      This method is for read information of tournament from sqlite.
      Returns:
      return tournament id, tournament date and mode of play to telegram.

    • take_part

      public static java.lang.String take_part​(java.lang.String tournament_id, int golfer_id)
      This method is use for take part function, insert golfer information into tournament if golfer desire to take part.
      Parameters:
      tournament_id - tournament ID to take part
      golfer_id - golfer ID to take part the tournament
      Returns:
      Comment will return like, "Full already" or "Success to take part"

    • tournament_take_part_number

      public static boolean tournament_take_part_number​(java.lang.String tournament_id)
      This method is for check the tournament participant number
      Parameters:
      tournament_id - tournament id from telegram is use for get data from play_tournament sqlite
      Returns:
      if participant number in this tournament is over than 6 return false, lower than 6 return true

    • readgolferid

      public static int readgolferid​(long telegram_id)
      This method is for read golfer ID from sqlite.
      Parameters:
      telegram_id - telegram id take from telegram id, use for get golfer_id from golfer database
      Returns:
      golfer id from sqlite

    • verifytournamentid

      public static boolean verifytournamentid​(java.lang.String tournament_id)
      This method is use for verify tournament ID in database or not.
      Parameters:
      tournament_id - tournament id get from telegram, use to get the all information from tournament database and verity the tournament ID
      Returns:
      return true if tournament ID pass from telegram is appear in database, return false if no have appear in database

    • verifytakepartstatus

      public static boolean verifytakepartstatus​(java.lang.String tournament_id, int golfer_id)
      This method is use to verify take part status based on tournament id and golfer id from telegram
      Parameters:
      tournament_id - tournament id to verify status take part
      golfer_id - golfer id use to verify status of take part tournament
      Returns:
      return false if they are in the database, return true if they are not in the database

      Returns:

    • verifymarkerid

      public static boolean verifymarkerid​(java.lang.String tournament_id, java.lang.String marker_id)
      This is for verifying marker id based on tournament id and marker id
      Parameters:
      tournament_id - is taken from database and as an identifier to verify marker id
      marker_id - is taken from database and as an identifier to verify marker id
      Returns:
      false if the marker id is not same with golfer id in the database or vice versa

    • setMarkerID

      telegram_id - is taken from telegram and as an identifier to set the marker id

      Parameters:
      tournament_id - as an identifier to check the reply marker id
      marker_id - as an identifier to check the reply marker id
      Returns:
      false if the marker id have been used by others players or vice versa

    • samemarkerid

      public static boolean samemarkerid​(java.lang.String tournament_id, java.lang.String marker_id, long telegram_id)
      This method is for checking the marker id from Telegram is same as the marker id from database
      Parameters:
      tournament_id - as an identifier to check whether the marker id from both side is same
      marker_id - as an identifier to check whether the marker id from both side is same
      telegram_id - as an identifier to check whether the marker id from both side is same
      Returns:
      true means to reject if they are same or vice versa

      Returns:
